scoringPlays.text: Ryan Yurachek 16 Yd pass from Chase Litton (Nick Smith Kick)
Ron Johnson 8 Yd Run (Bobby Puyol Kick)

videos.headline: Marshall thunders to early lead
videos.description: Marshall QB Chase Litton floats a pass to TE Ryan Yurachek for a 16-yard touchdown against UConn at the St. Petersburg Bowl.

videos.headline: Ron Johnson runs for the pylon
videos.description: UConn RB Ron Johnson takes the handoff right and runs for the corner of the end zone, scoring an 8-yard touchdown against Marshall.

videos.headline: B. Shirreffs pass intercepted,K. Gant return  for 8 yds
videos.description: Bryant Shirreffs pass intercepted Kendall Gant return for 8 yds to the Marsh 44

videos.headline: Huskies kicker gets help from the crossbar
videos.description: Uconn kicker Bobby Puyol squeaks in a 52-yard field goal by hitting the crossbar with 0.2 seconds remaining in the third quarter against Marshall.

videos.headline: UConn battles for fourth quarter interception
videos.description: Marshall's Chase Litton throws it deep only to have UConn's Jamar Summers run up and pick the ball off for his eighth interception of the season.

videos.headline: K. Davis run for 41 yds for a 1ST down
videos.description: Keion Davis run for 41 yds to the UConn 42 for a 1ST down
